articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria

articles.content:

articles.title: HDB resale price increase: Why are prices rising & what does it mean for home buyers? - AsiaOne
articles.description:
Singaporeans have been rushing to buy HDB resale flats recently. Here’s proof: a record-breaking 29 HDB resale flats priced at over $1 million were sold in November 2021.

articles.content:
